name: The Brew Crew in: Bubbling Paradise!
name_original: The Brew Crew in: Bubbling Paradise!
description: Abi, Ensi and Ulu are galactic peacekeepers! On a routine mission to look into a planetary super-weapon, they get swept up into a conspiracy spanning all of their homeworlds! Join them as they meet a myriad of friends and foes on their journey!
